CustomField.description: Created this field for sorting QLI on the template
CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(PricebookEntry.Product2.Product_Type__c, 'Users & Storage'),1, IF( ISPICKVAL(PricebookEntry.Product2.Product_Type__c, 'Core & Modules'),2, IF( ISPICKVAL(PricebookEntry.Product2.Product_Type__c, 'Integrations'),3, IF( ISPICKVAL(PricebookEntry.Product2.Product_Type__c, 'Success Package'),4, IF( ISPICKVAL(PricebookEntry.Product2.Product_Type__c, 'Contract'),5, IF( ISPICKVAL(PricebookEntry.Product2.Product_Type__c, 'Standalone'),6, IF( ISPICKVAL(PricebookEntry.Product2.Product_Type__c, 'Professional Service'),7, IF( ISPICKVAL(PricebookEntry.Product2.Product_Type__c, 'Add-ons'),8,9))))))))
CustomField.label: SpotDraft Product Sort Order
